events.message: I filed a claim after my car was involved in a collision at the intersection last night. The vehicle sustained significant front-end damage.
The claim has been categorised as an Auto Accident due to damage reported from a vehicle collision involving the insured's car.
An insurance agent has been assigned to manage the investigation and follow up with the claimant regarding the auto accident claim.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding the vehicle accident, and we are committed to assisting you through this process.
Please submit photos of the damaged vehicle, the police accident report, and any repair estimates to proceed with your auto accident claim.
The claimant has submitted all requested documents including photos, police report, and repair estimates for the car accident claim.
An investigation into the vehicle collision has commenced to assess liability and verify all submitted claim information and documents.
The investigation regarding the auto accident claim was completed successfully, confirming the incident details and extent of damage.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the investigation’s findings and repair cost estimates for the damaged vehicle.
The customer has responded positively to the proposed settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the claims handling process.
The auto accident claim has been approved in full, authorizing payment for the vehicle repairs as per the agreed settlement.
Payment has been issued to the claimant’s preferred account to cover the agreed settlement amount for the car accident claim.
The auto accident claim case is now officially closed following settlement payment and confirmation that the claimant is satisfied.
All documentation and records relating to the vehicle collision claim have been archived securely for future reference.
